  def single_series
     headers["content-type"]="text/html"
     @arr_data = []
     @arr_data << ['Product A','567500']
     @arr_data << ['Product B','815300']
     @arr_data << ['Product C','556800']
     @arr_data << ['Product D','734500']
     @arr_data << ['Product E','676800']
     @arr_data << ['Product F','648500']
  end
